mean_en: a small symbol on a computer or smartphone screen that represents a program or a file; a famous person or thing that people admire and see as a symbol of a particular idea, way of life, etc.; (in the Orthodox Church) a painting or statue of a holy person that is also thought of as a holy object
sentence: The icons have been interestingly arranged onto the desktop.
sentence_trans: 电脑屏幕上的图标以一种有趣的方式排列着。
